nodes.text: Wow... I was lucky that I got out of there alive.
I'm so exhausted I can barely think. I can't stop shivering. All I want to do is crawl in bed and hope I awaken in the morning.

nodes.name: Ticked at Terk
nodes.description: Terk caught me exploring the castle at night again and gave me demerits. Okay, so I shouldn't have been caught. On the other hand, Terk is such a jerk about it. One of these days, I need to get back at him.

nodes.text: I am really getting ticked off at Terk's picking on me all the time.
Getting caught by Terk is bad enough, but having to listen to his whiny complaints while he escorts me to my room is really, really irritating.
Grrrrr.
Maestro Lorenzo seemed pleased by my work and I think I passed the test. If I can survive the recital tomorrow without falling on my face or forgetting the music, I should get some good grades.
I've got final performances for my panpipes, drums, lute, and singing tomorrow, and I have to write a twenty page essay on "Oeuvre of Magister Lorenzo and its Effect on Modern Culture."
Oeuvre? Doesn't that mean egg?
Not egg-sactly, but the yolk's on me. I'm going to have egg on my face if I don't get it done.
What's a good rhyming word for "Headmaster?"
Uh... disaster?
Well, that's certainly appropriate.
Can you believe we're almost finished with this semester? Yay!
Of course, first we have to do all the term papers, exams, and music recitals. I guess I'd better start reading my required reading for bards.
How was your day off?
Life is easier to get through, When there's someone who loves you!
I'm so glad that tomorrow is a free day, aren't you? I could use the rest.
Today my soul is sailing on the sea of bliss.
Oh, by the way, Esme said she wanted to speak with you sometime tomorrow.
Have you seen the Drats running all over the place? Maestro Lorenzo is furious!
Esme doesn't want to date me.
You told me that Esme liked me! Esme doesn't even want to date me.
Esme really likes you better than me.
Esme is wonderful!
Sigh.
Esme is wonderful!
Did you see Esme today? She looked like she was dancing down the halls to the sound of violin music. She's adorable.
Did you see how lovely Esme looked today? Our eyes met and there was magic!
I've never seen so many spooks and hauntings in my life as I did tonight. This is a really impressive Noctes de Mortuis.
It's Noctes de Mortuis tomorrow - I imagine that there will be a lot of ghosts around this old place.
Katie says I'm not her type.
You lied to me about her.
Did you get a chance to see Katie today? She's so special.
That Katie is something special, isn't she? She's spicy and salty and really cute, too.
I am so glad the midterms are over, aren't you? I just hope I did all right.
Are you ready for the Midterms? Gah - I have to memorize five songs and read the entire book of music theory for tomorrow.
Maybe I should have started reading this book yesterday.
My class is going off to see an opera tomorrow. I'll be up early.
Lady Moira thinks I'm "nice."
I spoke to Lady Moira today. She barely knew who I was.
Why did you lie to me about her affection for me?
My angel of the infirmary doesn't think she could love me.
Did you see her? Have you seen the lovely Lady Moira of the Infirmary?
I saw a vision of beauty today... A maiden of mercy inhabits the infirmary - Lady Moira is amazing!
The stuff that was stolen from the music room was returned last night. I guess the Thief had an attack of conscience.
I found my missing panpipe! It was under the pile of clothes by the wardrobe all this time.
Today Maestro Lorenzo thought that the School Thief had pilfered his fiddle, but it turned out that someone else had borrowed it. So it was a bass canard.
My favorite panpipes are still missing. Are you sure none of your stuff was stolen?
Have you heard about the thefts in the school? Two people in my music theory class said that they had things stolen from their room.
I spoke to Sophia today. Why did you lie to me?
I spoke to Sophia. She just wants to be 'friends.'
I'm working on another song for Sophia... I'm going to sing it for her tomorrow.
Oh... someone left a letter for you.
You got another letter today.
Someone left a letter for you on your bed.
Did you see Sophia today? Isn't she gorgeous?
Have you met Sophia? She's so amazing... and she spoke to me today!
She's the woman of my dreams!
Evening, roomie. Someone left a letter on your bed earlier. Looks like you saw it already, though?
Evening, roomie. There's a letter someone left on your bed for you.
Hey there!
They said I was getting a roommate. Welcome to our dorm room.
I'm Aeolus. I'm studying to be a musical performer. What are you here for?
Hi, I'm Shawn O'Conner. I'm in the... er... Disbarred Bards' class.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm a bard too. You're welcome to borrow any of my instruments if you want to practice your skills.
Thanks! Got any lockpicks?
Say what?
Never mind. I didn't think so.
